review: This is for the Fire TV Stick, works great, but due to memory limitations many games my children play are not available to play on this device like they are on the Fire TV device. Works great for watching videos and other apps, just disappointed (and should have realized) that we can't play Asphalt 8, Minion game and several others that the children love to play. Will most likely replace with Fire TV down the road and use this for portable movies etc. when traveling or visiting others.
author: Amazon Customer
